mapper.select:
select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_nick as memberNick, member_phone as memberPhone, member_point as memberPoint, member_reportcount as memberReportCount, gender, birth, agreement, grade, member_picturename as memberPictureName, member_picturepath as memberPicturePath, enrollDate from member_tbl where member_id=#{memberId}
and member_Pw=#{memberPw}

select expert_tbl.member_no as memberNo, expert_tbl.expert_no as expertNo, product_tbl.product_no as productNo, product_tbl.product_title as productTitle, product_tbl.product_ImgPath as productImgPath, product_tbl.product_Intro as productIntro, product_tbl.product_no as productNo
from product_tbl join expert_tbl on (expert_tbl.expert_no = product_tbl.expert_no) where member_no=#{memberNo}

select qst_no as qstNo, qst_title as qstTitle, qst_date as qstDate
from question_tbl

select product_tbl.product_no as productNo, product_title as productTitle, product_type as productType, pay_date as payDate, product_imgPath as productImgPath, payment, pay_state as paystate, pay_No as payNo, member_No as memberNo from product_tbl join payment_tbl on (payment_tbl.product_no = product_tbl.product_no) where member_no=#{memberNo}

select payment_tbl.pay_no as payNo, product_tbl.product_type as productType, product_tbl.product_imgPath as productImgPath, product_tbl.product_title as productTitle, payment_tbl.payment as payment from product_tbl join payment_tbl on (payment_tbl.product_no = product_tbl.product_no) join wishlist_tbl on (wishlist_tbl.product_no = product_tbl.product_no) where wishlist_tbl.member_no=#{memberNo}
select product_no as productNo, review_No as reviewNo, review_title as reviewTitle, review_content as reviewContent, review_date as reviewDate from review_tbl where member_no=#{memberNo}
select expert_no, member_no, (select member_picturepath from member_tbl where expert_tbl.member_no = member_tbl.member_no) as memberPicturepath from expert_tbl where expert_no=#{exportNo}

SELECT EXPERT_NO as expertNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, EXPERT_CATEGORY as expertCategory, EXPERT_TAG as expertTag, CREDENTIAL, ISSUING_AUTHORITY as issuingAuthority, ACQUISTION_DATE as acquistionDate, EXPERT_NAME as expertName, EXPERT_PHONE as expertPhone, EXPERT_EMAIL as expertEmail, EXPERT_CONTENT as expertContent, JOB_NAME as jobName, EXPERT_PR as expertPr, EXPERT_CAREER as expertCareer, EXPERT_INTRO as expertIntro FROM expert_tbl where expert_no=#{expertNo}

SELECT E.EXPERT_NO as expertNo, E.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, EXPERT_CATEGORY as expertCategory, EXPERT_TAG as expertTag, CREDENTIAL, ISSUING_AUTHORITY as issuingAuthority, ACQUISTION_DATE as acquistionDate, EXPERT_NAME as expertName, EXPERT_PHONE as expertPhone, EXPERT_EMAIL as expertEmail, EXPERT_CONTENT as expertContent, JOB_NAME as jobName, EXPERT_PR as expertPr, EXPERT_CAREER as expertCareer, EXPERT_INTRO as expertIntro FROM EXPERT_TBL E JOIN PRODUCT_TBL PRO ON PRO.EXPERT_NO = E.EXPERT_NO JOIN PAYMENT_TBL PAY ON PRO.PRODUCT_NO = PAY.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PAY.PAY_NO=#{payNo}

select e.expert_no as expertNo, m.member_no as memberNo, member_picturepath as memberPicturepath from expert_tbl e join member_tbl m on e.member_no = m.member_no join product_tbl pro on e.expert_no = pro.expert_no join payment_tbl pay on pro.product_no = pay.product_no where pay.pay_no=#{payNo}
mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl values( member_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNick}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPoint}, #{memberReportCount}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{agreement}, #{grade}, #{memberPictureName}, #{memberPicturePath}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: select e.expert_name as expertName, m.member_picturepath as memberPicturePath from product_tbl p join review_tbl r on p.product_no = r.product_no join expert_tbl e on p.expert_no = e.expert_no join member_tbl m on e.member_no = m.member_no where review_no=#{reviewNo}
mapper.update: update member_tbl set member_pw=#{memberPw} where member_id=#{memberId}
